source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Manga Drawing Basic Course / Create Character & Draw Human

visible_instructors.title: MANABI JOURNEY
visible_instructors.job_title: Education biz / 教材開発・出版事業
visible_instructors.name: MANABI

items.headline: Let's learn how to create characters who enrich your story! [English Subtitles]
objectives_summary: You can learn Japanese Manga drawing skills and draw it.
You can obtain basic skills and post your manga on manga posting site.
We focus on that you can draw manga rapidly, not become a professional manga artist.

items.title: Impressionism - Paint this Night Cityscape in Oil or Acrylic
items.headline: Learn Impressionism techniques by creating this San Francisco painting. For total beginner through advanced painters.
objectives_summary: Create an entire painting in one sitting
Understand Impressionism and why it is so powerful
Understand how light works to make things look the way they do, and how to translate that into your paintings

items.title: Learn The Art of Bobbin Lace Making Beginners Class
items.headline: Master the basics and complete a bookmark pattern
objectives_summary: Students will learn the ancient art of making bobbin lace
learn the terminology of how to make lace
learn the basic movements to make lace

items.title: How to sculpt the female body

visible_instructors.title: Francesca Dalla Benetta
visible_instructors.job_title: Escultora, Artista Plastica y Caracterizadora (Makeup FX)
visible_instructors.name: Francesca

items.headline: Make a oil based clay sculpture  of the human body in a professional way, guided step by step in the process.
objectives_summary: Learning from scratch to make a sculpture of a female figure
Use the photographic references correctly
Make a three-dimensional piece modeled in plasticine

items.title: How to Draw Hands - Hand Figure Drawing Anatomy Course
items.headline: How to Draw People - The Easy Way I Human body
objectives_summary: How to Draw
How to Draw Hands
How to Draw People

items.title: Drawing and Painting for Kids and Beginner Adults: Birds!
items.headline: Create Your Own Tropical Bird with Watercolor Painting Lessons!  Drawing, Painting, Shading, Texture, Form, Value, Color
objectives_summary: Students will be able to create a finished Tropical Bird artwork of their own design!
Students will gain a basic understanding of using in-expensive materials to create a meaningful artwork
Students will learn basic techniques of water-color painting and pencil drawing

items.title: Advance Your Sewing Skills
items.headline: This extensive sewing course will help improve many aspects of your sewing skills and help improve your projects
objectives_summary: This sewing course provides the skills and techniques to take your sewing projects to the next level.
How to get crisp corners when working with bulky fabrics
Several different hemming methods including no-sew and blind hems.

items.title: Paint your own Christmas Cards
items.headline: Paint beautiful personalized cards and learn some new watercolor techniques along the way!
objectives_summary: Paint Christmas cards in watercolor in a range of styles

items.title: How to Draw Anything - Drawing 3D 101 Pen and Ink Course
items.headline: Drawing for Beginners - The Easy Way
objectives_summary: How to Draw Anything
Drawing

items.title: Watercolour Painting - Frequently Asked Questions

visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A

items.headline: If you are just starting out with watercolour painting here are some questions I get asked time and again.
objectives_summary: Learn some essential information about the materials and equipment.
Learn about some basic skills and techniques.
How to paint shadows.

items.title: WATERCOLOR Guide - Explore the joy of  Watercolor painting
items.headline: Explore the boundless pleasure of Watercolor Painting. Master skills - sketching, composition, color mix, light shading
objectives_summary: How to paint with watercolor easily and effectively
How to do sketching before applying the paint
Set up composition in the subject

items.title: Color & Light Masterclass

visible_instructors.title: Iva Mikles
visible_instructors.job_title: Illustrator | Host of Art Side of Life
visible_instructors.name: Iva

items.headline: All Color and Light Concepts explained with real life examples!
objectives_summary: Color and light concepts broken down into manageable parts
How to quickly adjust the mood of your artworks
What is important in your artworks using color and light together with the contrast and composition

items.title: Learn how to make a retro digital collage
items.headline: Retro / Vintage illustration from scratch
objectives_summary: How to make a retro / vintage looking digital collage in Adobe Photoshop
How to put together a composition with a retro style
Make the most of photoshop for digital collage illustration

items.title: Acrylic Painting For Beginners

visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.name: Robert

items.headline: Clear & concise course without all the fluff
objectives_summary: Learn how to use the brush and apply acrylics properly to get the best fluid strokes
Learn how to apply acrylics using a variety of gradation techniques
Learn color mixing theory to get the best hues

items.title: Paint with your intuition, sketch and COLOR yourself HAPPY.

visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A

items.headline: Let you inner child come out to play and help stay in the moment & have fun with paints, marks & images. Let it happen.
objectives_summary: Learn how to enjoy the painting process simply for the pleasure of 'the doing'
Enjoy staying in the present moment and stilling your mind.
Learn more about how your watercolour paints work with water and each other.

items.title: MIG Welding Part 1

visible_instructors.title: Desiree Rohrer
visible_instructors.job_title: CEO of Hangar44, the very first Garage Studio in Europe
visible_instructors.name: Desiree

items.headline: The technique of metal inert gas welding for beginners and advanced.
objectives_summary: In the course MIG and MAG welding part 1 you can learn about inert gas welding using practical examples
